name: source/ArrayView.js
source/Component.js
setAccessor
description:
Define a set of Getter or Setter for DOM properties,
and store their values into private object.

params.name: map
params.description:
`1` for Getter, `2` for Setter & sum for both
                      in each key's value

return.description: The index of `element` in its siblings
The target of `event` object (**Shadow DOM** is in account)
Element set which matches `selector` in this Shadow DOM

name: source/index.js
set
description: Set private data of an HTMLElement

name: get
description: Get private data of an HTMLElement

name: source/ObjectView.js
source/Template.js

params.name: varName
params.description: Name list of the Local variable

params.name: parameter
params.description: One or more value of the Local variable

name: ChangedCallback
description: Call back only on Value changed

name: source/utility.js
extend
description:
Merge own properties of two or more objects together into the first object
by their descriptor

params.name: target
params.description:
An object that will receive the new properties
                            if `source` are passed in

params.name: source
params.description: Additional objects containing properties to merge in

name: mapTree
description: Traverse Object-tree & return Node array through the filter

return.description:
`Null` or `Undefined` to **Skip the Sub-Tree**,
                   and Any other Type to Add into the Result Array.

name: source/View.js

params.name: nameKey
params.description:
Key (littleCamelCase) of HTML `data-*`
                                                    to get name of bound data

return.description: Cloned & imported Node (with its child nodes)
This view or the view bound before
Full markup code of this view

name: valueOf
description: Get original data of this view

name: clear
description: Reset this view to empty data

content:
# Web Cell

Light-weight **[Web Components](https://www.webcomponents.org/) engine** based on ECMAScript 6+, powered by the practice & experience from developing [EWA v1.0 ~ 4.0](https://gitee.com/Tech_Query/EasyWebApp/).

[![NPM Dependency](https://david-dm.org/EasyWebApp/WebCell.js.svg)](https://david-dm.org/EasyWebApp/WebCell.js)

[![NPM](https://nodei.co/npm/web-cell.png?downloads=true&downloadRank=true&stars=true)](https://nodei.co/npm/web-cell/)



## Basic Usage

First

```Shell
npm install web-cell
```
then

```HTML
<!DocType HTML>
<html><head>
    <script src="https://cdn.bootcss.com/webcomponentsjs/1.2.0/webcomponents-lite.js"></script>
    <script src="node_modules/web-cell/build/WebCell.js"></script>

    <link rel="import" href="path/to/your-component/index.html" />
    <!-- More Import tags of your Web components -->
</head><body>
    <your-component></your-component>
</body></html>
```
If you use [ESLint](https://eslint.org/), add options below into its configuration:

```JSON
{
    "globals": {
        "WebCell": false
    }
}
```


## API document

 - Online --- https://easywebapp.github.io/WebCell/

 - Offline --- `npm run help`



## Typical case

 1. [Month Picker](https://github.com/TechQuery/month-picker)
